Add GitHub Actions workflows and fix redirected links

This PR adds comprehensive CI/CD workflows and updates broken/redirected links.

## GitHub Actions Workflows

### 1. Branch Protection
- Prevents direct commits to main/master branches
- Enforces pull request workflow
- Allows automated bot merges \(Dependabot, GitHub Actions\)
- Provides clear error messages with remediation steps

### 2. PR Validation
- Validates branch naming conventions
- Checks PR title quality and length
- Detects merge conflicts
- Validates commit messages
- Warns about large PRs \(50+ files, 1000+ lines\)
- Checks for PR labels

### 3. Link Checker \(Primary\)
- Uses Lychee for fast, async link validation
- Checks all markdown files on PRs
- Excludes schema URLs and YAML files
- Excludes placeholder URLs \(localhost, *.dest\)
- Retries failed requests up to 3 times
- Posts PR comments when broken links found

### 4. Markdown Link Check \(Backup\)
- Alternative link checker for markdown files
- Checks only modified files on PRs
- Weekly scheduled full repository scan \(Mondays 9 AM UTC\)
- Custom retry logic for rate-limited endpoints

## Configuration Files

- `.github/lychee.toml` - Lychee configuration with exclusions
- `.github/markdown-link-check-config.json` - Markdown link check config
- `.github/BRANCH_PROTECTION.md` - Complete setup guide
- `.github/workflows/README.md` - Workflow documentation
